Sergio Marchionne said both companies going forward would continue to pursue strategic alliances, saying that the market was changing "at the speed of light." He cited Fiat's Chrysler stake as an example. I think our presence in Chrysler could not have been forecast, and certainly in hindsight it was probably one of the best things that could have happened to Fiat. I think it is also one of the best things that could have happened to Chrysler too. Sergio Marchionne already has a lot on his plate this year. hints, Colin Powell became obsessed with justifying himself to the point of falsifying what happened. Donald Rumsfeld clearly can't abide Colin Powell 's deputy, Richard Armitage . In one scene, he confronts Colin Powell , telling him that Richard Armitage has been bad-mouthing the Pentagon all over town... I don't know what the hell is in Richard Armitage 's craw but I'm tired of it. There are some puckish observations. Allen Iverson 's Žydrūnas Ilgauskasgest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. Just get your swagger back, Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. "That's really what I did. It helped me out." Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds,

Egypt, added the statement, recognized and appreciated the care accorded by Germany to the painted limestone bust of the famous ancient Egyptian queen, but added: Egypt is confident that the German authorities will assist in facilitating its return. The government and people of Egypt are eager that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people. If returned, Zahi Hawass said, the bust will be exhibited at a new museum south of Cairo.

. "I'm somewhat perplexed by the obsession because I don't think the facts support it. Things are going great for Google," he added. However, he apparently said: We have a competitor called Microsoft[ that] has more cash, more engineers, more global reach. We see competition from Microsoft every day. He then addressed competition with Apple, which Google partners with on YouTube, maps and search, but of course the two companies are smartphone rivals.
